trans-unit.source: Provides a way to arrange content in a grid where all the cells in the grid have the same size.
trans-unit.target: Kan ordne innholdet i et rutenett der alle celler i rutenettet har samme størrelse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Defines the layout of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid"></xref> by distributing space evenly among all of the child elements.
trans-unit.target: Definerer oppsettet for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid"> </xref> ved å distribuere høye alle underordnede elementer.

trans-unit.source: The `arrangeSize` parameter defines the space in the layout area that is available for the grid.
trans-unit.target: Den `arrangeSize` parameteren definerer plassen under oppsett som er tilgjengelig for rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are two rows and four columns in a grid, the possible height for each cell is 0.5\**arrangeSizeHeight* and the maximum width is 0.25\**arrangeSizeWidth*.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis det finnes to rader og fire kolonner i et rutenett, mulig høyden for hver celle er 0,5\**arrangeSizeHeight* og maksimumsbredden 0,25\**arrangeSizeWidth*.

trans-unit.source: For these calculations, *arrangeSizeHeight* is the <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A> value of the `arrangeSize` parameter and *arrangeSizeWidth* is the <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A> value of the `arrangeSize` parameter.
trans-unit.target: For disse beregningene *arrangeSizeHeight* er den <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A>verdien for den `arrangeSize` parameteren og *arrangeSizeWidth* er den <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A>verdien for den `arrangeSize` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Size.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> of the area for the grid to use.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> for området for rutenett som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> of the grid that is rendered to display the child elements that are visible.
trans-unit.target: Den faktiske <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> i rutenettet som gjengis for å vise de underordnede elementene som er synlige.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns that are in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antallet kolonner i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: A value of zero (0) for the Columns property specifies that the column count is computed based on the number of rows and the number of visible child elements that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien null (0) for kolonnene egenskapen angir kolonneantallet beregnes basert på antall rader og antallet synlige underordnede elementer i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.FirstColumn%2A> must be less than the value of the Columns property for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid> to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.FirstColumn%2A>må være lavere enn verdien for egenskapen kolonner for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid>skal fungere riktig.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.FirstColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`||

trans-unit.source: The number of columns that are in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.Columns*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.Columns*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.Columns*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of leading blank cells in the first row of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor mange innledende blanke celler i den første raden i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the FirstColumn must be less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.Columns%2A> property for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid> to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for FirstColumn må være mindre enn verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.Columns%2A>egenskapen for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid>skal fungere riktig.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`||

trans-unit.source: The number of empty cells that are in the first row of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Antall tomme cellene i den første raden i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.FirstColumn*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.FirstColumn*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.FirstColumn*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Computes the desired size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid"></xref> by measuring all of the child elements.
trans-unit.target: Beregner ønsket størrelse på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid"> </xref> ved å måle alle underordnede elementer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> of the available area for the grid.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> for området som er tilgjengelige for rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: The desired based on the child content of the grid and the constraint parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den ønskede basert på underordnet innholdet i rutenettet og constraint parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows that are in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antall rader i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: A value of zero (0) for the Rows property specifies that the row count is computed based on the number of columns and the number of visible child elements that are in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Verdien null (0) for rader som angir antall rader beregnes basert på antall kolonner og antallet synlige underordnede elementer i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`||

trans-unit.source: The number of rows that are in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader i rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.Rows*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.Rows*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.UniformGrid.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
